citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A male armadillo was found dead during June 2020. The animal was under treatment for a medical condition, and
subsequently died due to unknown circumstances.
All animals must receive appropriate care and treatment to ensure their health and well-being. The individual that was
responsible for the care of the armadillo is no longer at the facility.
Correct from this day forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A male armadillo was found dead during June 2020.  The animal was under treatment for a medical condition, and 
subsequently died due to unknown circumstances. 
All animals must receive appropriate care and treatment to ensure their health and well-being.  The individual that was 
responsible for the care of the armadillo is no longer at the facility. 
Correct from this day forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
